data.name: Daredevil
data.description: A tough bruiser who delivers bonus attacks, chain attacks, and counterattacks.

starItems.name: Daredevil
starItems.description: A tough bruiser who delivers bonus attacks, chain attacks, and counterattacks.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
If target is <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color>, chance to Bonus attack increases to <color=#86e619>60%</color>.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> characters.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and Bonus attack

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.
If target is <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color>, chance to Bonus attack increases to <color=#86e619>60%</color>.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> characters.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and Bonus attack

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.
If target is <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color>, chance to Bonus attack increases to <color=#86e619>60%</color>.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> characters.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary attack
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to gain a Bonus attack
If target is <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color>, chance to Bonus attack increases to <color=#86e619>80%</color>.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.

<color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.
If target is <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color>, chance to Bonus attack increases to <color=#86e619>80%</color>.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> characters.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and Bonus attack

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage.

<color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.
If target is <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color>, chance to Bonus attack increases to <color=#86e619>80%</color>.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> characters.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and Bonus attack

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage.

<color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
If target is <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color>, chance to Bonus attack increases to <color=#86e619>80%</color>.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> characters.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary attack
Always Bonus attack

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> characters.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage. Dodge breaks this Chain.

Gain <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage. Dodge breaks this Chain.

Gain <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Always Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> secondary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> allies

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage. Dodge breaks this Chain.

Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> allies

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage. Dodge breaks this Chain.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage. Dodge breaks this Chain.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> allies.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage. Dodge breaks this Chain.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> targets
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> all <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage. Dodge breaks this Chain.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies this attack cannot be Blocked.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies this attack cannot be Blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies this attack cannot be Blocked.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies this attack cannot be Blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>330%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies this attack cannot be Blocked.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>370%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies this attack cannot be Blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color>-<color=#86e619>6</color> adjacent targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color>-<color=#86e619>6</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies this attack cannot be Blocked.

1.description: Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed for Self and <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> allies. This is applied after any character has taken an action.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Dodge chance
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Dodge chance per <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> ally

2.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed for Self and <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> allies. This is applied after any character has taken an action.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Dodge chance. Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Dodge chance per <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> ally.

3.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed for Self and <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> allies. This is applied after any character has taken an action.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Dodge chance. Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Dodge chance per <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> ally. Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance for each <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> ally

4.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed for Self and <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> allies. This is applied after any character has taken an action.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Dodge chance. Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Dodge chance per <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> ally. Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance for each <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> ally.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed for Self and <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> allies
<color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Dodge chance per <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> ally
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> additional Speed for Self and <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies

5.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed for Self, <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color>, and <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies. This is applied after any character has taken an action.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Dodge chance. Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Dodge chance per <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> ally. Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > If this character has <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance for each <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> ally.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed for Self.
 > <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed.
